participant_1.background:
I'm proud of my ability to live on my own and support myself.
halloween is my favorite holiday.
i am learning how to play the piano.
I care more about my own stories than social media.
My worst experience was when one of my cats got hit by a car and died.

participant_2.background:
I make a pot of coffee and take a deep breath of the fresh air before I begin my day.
My appearance is not a big concern for me, as I'm more focused on improving my relationship with my family.
I am a software engineer, but my true passion is geocaching.
i am single and live alone.
i am living at home but hope to live in the dorms next year.

content.text: Good. Just made a pot of coffee and looking forward to getting some geocaching in today.
That sounds fun! I have never tried it.
Its really fun. You go to different places and use GPS coordinates to find hidden containers.
That sounds like a cool way to explore new places.
It is. I've found some really cool places I never would have found otherwise.
Do you go alone or with friends?
Mostly with friends. Its more fun that way.
That makes sense. Id probably be too scared to go alone.
There are some people who go alone, but I wouldn't recommend it.
Whats the best part about geocaching?
I think its the feeling of accomplishment when you find a container.
I can imagine. That would be really cool.
It is. And its also a great way to meet new people.
It sounds like a lot of fun. I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! I think youd enjoy it
